author: Tyler Dunne
title: TCU's Jalen Reagor on Why Guerilla Training Will Make Him the Draft's Best WR
description: As an  NFL  draft prospect, your life is usually scripted down to the hour by agents, trainers, nutritionists and the league itself...
content:
John E. Moore III/Getty Images
As an NFL draft prospect, your life is usually scripted down to the hour by agents, trainers, nutritionists and the league itself.
After your final collegiate game, you're shepherded to an all-star game, then a training facili… [+10348 chars]
